message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.CY, cs.HC 

This paper is likely to belong to the sub-category of cs.LG (Machine Learning) as it deals with developing learning algorithms for personalized recommendation systems. It may also belong to cs.IR (Information Retrieval) as recommendation systems are used extensively in information retrieval. Additionally, it may belong to cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) as the paper discusses the effect of user influence on the recommendation system. It may also belong to cs.CY (Computers and Society) as it discusses the impact of recommendation systems on user interests. Finally, it may belong to cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) as it deals with the interaction between users and recommendation systems.
